title: Normals MM a bit off lately?
body: Lately I've been seeing a few golds in my loading screens which is unusual for me it doesn't really bother me just that some of them can get a tad egotistical is MM just a bit out of whack cuz new season?

replies.body: Yeah Normal MM is pretty random.

a) Holidays
b) Normals
c) the above generally means a large chunk of regular ranked players go into normals.
